components/cart/coupon-codes:
{{inject 'couponCodeEmptyInput' (lang 'cart.coupon_codes.error')}}

{{lang 'cart.coupon_codes.coupon_code'}}

{{#if cart.coupons}} {{#each cart.coupons}} {{lang 'cart.coupon_codes.label' code=code}} ({{lang 'cart.coupon_codes.remove'}}) {{discount.formatted}} {{/each}} {{/if}}

{{lang 'cart.coupon_codes.enter_code'}}
components/cart/gift-certificates:
{{inject 'giftCertificateInputEmpty' (lang 'cart.gift_certificates.error')}}

{{lang 'cart.gift_certificates.gift_certificate'}}

{{#each cart.gift_certificates}} {{lang 'cart.gift_certificates.label' code=code}} {{remaining.formatted}} {{lang 'cart.gift_certificates.remove'}} {{used.formatted}} {{/each}}

{{lang 'cart.gift_certificates.enter_code'}}
